casebody.data:
William S. MILLS, as Guardian ad Litem for Alex Pitts; Melissa Pitts and Jeff Pitts
v.
Richard DWANE, M.D.; Private Diagnostic Clinic, PLLC; and Duke University. No. 516P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2004. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Raleigh, Charles R. Holton, Research Triangle Park, for Dwane et al. Donald H. Beskind, Raleigh, for Mills et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 8th day of October 2004 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2004."
